issues.name: Deforestation
issues.description: Deforestation is the permanent destruction of forests in order to make the land available for other uses, such as agriculture or urbanization.
solutions: Support companies that practice sustainable forestry

issues.name: Ocean Pollution
issues.description: Ocean pollution is the release of harmful substances such as plastic, oil, and industrial waste into the ocean.

issues.name: Air Pollution
issues.description: Air pollution is the release of harmful substances such as particulate matter, nitrogen oxides, and sulfur dioxide into the air.
